💑 You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
🤝 The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
❤️ Love is when the other person’s happiness is more important than your own.
💖 In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours.
📖 Every love story is beautiful, but ours is my favorite.
💓 I need you like a heart needs a beat.
🏡 Together is a beautiful place to be.
🌈 Love recognizes no barriers.
☀️ You are my sunshine on a cloudy day.
🌸 Where there is love, there is life.
😊 You make my heart smile.
💞 I love you not because of who you are, but because of who I am when I am with you.
🫶 Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
♾️ A true love story never ends.
🧩 You are the missing piece to my puzzle.
💭 Every moment spent with you is like a beautiful dream come true.
⏳ Forever is a long time, but I wouldn’t mind spending it by your side.
🌍 You are my greatest adventure.
👩‍❤️‍👨 Happiness is being married to your best friend.
🔑 Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
